column5: Beautiful renovated suite minutes from Toyota Corp., Nebraska furniture, liberty mutual, FedEx, Cowboys training camp, IKEA, Allen Outlet mall, Stonebriar mall, DFW airport. Family home. Has private private bathroom, mini fridge, and microwave,huge yard, down the street from amazing park, quiet and safe neighborhood. Has private entrance as well. Cool eclectic art, minimalist decor with world travel pieces.
